Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,891Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 31

entry.title: The Demon Spawn Surveillance Strategy (The DSSS)
entry.summary:
Author: YourLocalGothamite

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,381Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 76

Summary: It starts with Jon Kent's horrible lies.It ends with three grown (only physically) men in tactical gear, desperately clinging to a rooftop, watching Damian Wayne get his cheeks squished (!!??) by a girl (WHAT!!???) in a pink hoodie.The Batboys started to notice something was off with Damian, all because of Jon. Damian would come up with weird excuses. Disappearing. Showing up with a weird look in his eye. (??) So naturally, they did what any loving brothers would do: launched a full-scale spy mission.The DSSS includes but is not limited to:- Unauthorized rooftop stakeouts- Theoretical witchcraft accusations- A whiteboard- Red string- Glitter glueAnd many more. Stay tuned for the emotional rollercoaster Damian unknowingly sends his brothers on ;).

entry.title: Show and Tell
entry.summary:
Author: PresidentHao

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,452Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Everyone knew Damian Wayne. It wasn't every day that two of the most influential magical families, not to mention England's most renowned auror family and the Middle East's ancient family of alleged dark wizards, came together despite their differences to welcome a pure heir to both sides of the coin.It was impossible not to know the name Damian Wayne.After strange events had led to his presence being unwelcome at Durmstrang and his ending up at Hogwarts, the great prince charming had dedicated himself to a specific mission from day one on the castle grounds. He hadn't waited for his first dinner to even happen properly. And his mission was this: to make my life miserable for a simple mistake that we could have solved by being nice.The problem was that he isn't nice and neither am I, and I wouldn't let him and his big name walk all over me like I was trash.

entry.title: Opposites Attract
entry.summary:
Author: nowaywhyamihere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,804Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 279

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t notice people—unless they give him a reason to. Most are too loud, too fake, or too eager to impress someone with his last name. But her? She was different. Always smiling, even at him. Always kind, even when he gave her nothing. He didn’t understand it, but he remembered it. And that was new.

entry.title: Certain feelings (like fireworks)
entry.summary:
Author: justiceiscalling

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,229Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: Damian stands alone, leaning on the edge of the building. You’re not surprised by this—Damian has always preferred being alone to being with others. Honestly, you’re not sure he even enjoys being with others (though Jon has assured you he does). The only reason you think he maybe can tolerate being around a group of people, aside from Jon’s constant assurance, was the fact that he was here, on this roof.He doesn’t have a red solo cup, but he’s holding a glass cup full of water that he presumably brought from downstairs. You rush to his side in a matter of seconds. “We’re not late!” You announce loudly to him.Damian doesn’t startle—you’re not sure he’s capable of that. He turns his head slightly in your direction, his expression remaining emotionless. He straightens up slightly, you weren’t even sure that was possible, given his already pristine posture. “I know.” He states casually, taking a long sip from his water. “I gave you the wrong time.”“I—” You pause for a second. “Are you serious?”“It doesn’t start for,” Damian lifted the left sleeve of his black shirt to look at his watch. It looked expensive and, knowing him, it probably was. “Another twelve minutes and about… thirty-two seconds.”

entry.title: Two Doves
entry.summary:
Author: Crytology

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,610Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 120

Summary: You and Damian Wayne grew up together, he was the youngest boy in your class and you were the most boisterous child he had met.Quickly you grew to become inseparable, though Damian was always a bit of a mystery to you with his prolonged absences and seemingly endless knowledge. But that didn't stop your feelings for him, when he disappears from your life early into your college years, turning up without a word before graduation, you aimed to protect yourself by shutting him out of your life.You go to medical school states away, and do well for yourself, well enough that you end up in one of the top surgical residencies in the country at Gotham General. Unbeknownst to you, this homecoming would bring the familiar face of your ex-best friend back into the forefront of your life.You must navigate your intern year with Damian at your side, Stephanie in your Emergency Department, and a private physician's constant attempts to recruit you, all while saving lives and studying for your next exam.

entry.title: Clocks
entry.summary:
Author: Kollywabbles

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,173Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 13

Summary: It's been a little over eight years since you've actually interacted with anyone your own age. This didn't concern you at all, however, in an unfortunate turn of events it apparently concerned Zatanna plenty. At times you really wish this chick didn't care about your "well-being".Honestly! What about living with other teenagers did any good to your so called "well-being". This is ridiculous! You could be back in the House of Mystery learning kick-ass sorcery but instead you're here at Titans' Tower trying to explain to Superboy why it's impossible for him to punch off Doctor Fate's helmet.Considering all circumstances, it could be worse; a full on war between Chaos and Order could be going on right now. Oh wait. There is! So why did Zatanna send you here with that knowledge hanging above her head? No clue. Why did Doctor Fate and Constantine let her do it? Again, no fucking clue.This sucks.

entry.title: Monkeying .vs. Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Hisakoinoue

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,949Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Both have a dark past and a seemingly promising future. Damian Wayne is not an easy boy to get along with—but how can you blame him? He was raised as an assassin. You’re fairly reserved, trying not to stir up trouble for others; your past taught you that keeping a low profile was the best way to stay safe. A former assassin and a former victim might just be the perfect pairing to achieve heroic ambitions—or at the very least, to uncover a few mysteries along the way.*Originally published on Wattpad*
